text: In preconditioning protocols, volatiles (compared to total intravenous anaesthesia) » Reduce CK-MB and cTnl release post-ischaemia (= reduced myocardial damage) » Preservation of global haemodynamic and left ventricular function » Shorter ICU and total hospital stays » Faster weaning from mechanical ventilation » Trend towards reduced myocardial infarction and death » Reduced incidence of long-term cardiac events
